'''Avatars''' are icons that are displayed on the player's [[Profile]], [[Paimon Menu]], [[Friend]] List and [[Co-Op Mode]] menu. They can be changed at Paimon Menu > Edit > Change Avatar.

Players can unlock Profile Avatars by unlocking [[Character]]s, unlocking [[Character Outfit]]s, and completing [[Quest]]s.
